effect.name: Glitch Background
effect.description:
Creates horizontal tearing and color bleeding
Last Updated: 2022-07-17 12:16
effect.author: Shadoku, DX11 Port by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Power
parameter.description: Power of tearing effect, lower is more powerful

parameter.name: Distortion map
parameter.description: Control power of distortion, red channel controls tearing and green channel controls color bleed
